name: Panache
description: Hitting an enemy with any additional ATTACK move, such as DASH attack or DEFENSE's Riposte grants one Panache token (up to 3)
Each Panache token grants +5 DMG and +4% ATTACK SPEED
When Romeo is hit, all Panache tokens are lost

name: Kiss The Bride
description: Quest (x20): Hitting at least one enemy with SPECIAL grants +0.5 Crit Chance
Reward: Any enemy hit by SPECIAL has a 40% chance to grant Romeo 2 Dream Shard(s)

name: Secret Weapon
description: Quest (x20): Blocking at least one attack during DEFENSE grants +0.5 DMG
Reward: ATTACK Riposte after DEFENSE deals +32% more damage per successful block (up to 3 times)

name: Ice Rose
description: POWER now throws ice Roses, applying CHILLED to hit enemies
POWER deals +40% damage

name: Healing Rose
description: Every 2 times the POWER Rose hits an enemy, it restores 2 Health to all Heroes around

name: Kick
description: Adds a kick to ATTACK combo, dealing 400% damage and pushing light enemies back
Kick can grant a Panache Token

name: Relentless Assaults
description: ATTACK used right after POWER triggers DEFENSE's Riposte launching a flurry of attacks, dealing up to 64 damage

name: Surge of Bravery
description: After SPECIAL's kiss, the next 6 ATTACKS gain +30% range and deal +30% damage

name: Thorny Rose
description: When POWER Rose blooms, 5 paths of thorns spread around, dealing 13 damage per second to enemies crossing through
changePerLevel: Rare & Legendary: +3 damage + Hero Level + DMG

name: Floral Dodge
description: DEFENSE now creates a POWER Rose dealing 40% damage

name: Burning Kiss
description: SPECIAL's area of effect gains +25% range, +40% more damage and applies IGNITE to hit enemies

name: Thorns Aura
description: After using TRAIT or receiving Juliet's TRAIT, an aura of thorns appears around Romeo dealing x area damage per second for 6 second(s)

name: Love Thread*
description: Using TRAIT casts a beam towards Juliet for 6 second(s), dealing 33 damage per second to crossed enemies

name: Flash of Steel
description: Holding DASH during a dash attack makes Romeo rush back towards his starting location, dealing 120% damage along his path

name: Selfless Defender
description: Blocking at least one attack during DEFENSE grants 12 SHIELD to all Heroes around for 8 second(s)

name: Deadly Brambles
description: 4th strike of ATTACK combo implants brambles on enemies, dealing 40 damage over 5 seconds
Brambles explode when Romeo implants an already affected enemy again or on enemy death, dealing 200% area damage

name: Fencing Reflex
description: Basic ATTACKS can turn into a block when Romeo gets hit (every 5 seconds max)
After it blocks, Romeo gains +40% Crit Chance for 4 second(s)

name: Swarm of Petals
description: Using POWER also launches a swarm of petals in a cone, pushing back light enemies and dealing 40% damage

name: Wind Spiral
description: DEFENSE creates a wind spiral around Romeo dealing up to 60 area damage

name: Broad Stroke
description: ATTACK used right after DASH triggers a broad stroke, dealing 400% damage all around
Broad Stroke can grant a Panache Token

name: Love Shield
description: After SPECIAL's kiss, Romeo and Juliet are surrounded by a Love Shield, making them INVINCIBLE for 4 seconds
Love Shield has a cooldown of 14 seconds

name: Bursting Bloom
description: When POWER Rose blooms, trigger a burst of petals dealing 40% area damage

name: Burning Dance
description: ULTIMATE applies IGNITE to hit enemies and deals 40% damage

name: Explosive Performance
description: During ULTIMATE's dance, launch 24 firework rockets all around, exploding on impact and dealing 17 damage each

name: Funeral Bouquet
description: ATTACKS throw ULTIMATE's Black Roses, dealing 3 damage each

name: Tempestuous Roses
description: Romeo throws 56 Black Roses in a wide cone dealing 13 damage each and is now surrounded by a tempest, dealing 32 area damage per second
